title: Can we request for a male furry that is naughty?
body:
I would like to see a male furry that is somewhat of a naughty boy, either as a skin or a new champion.
I would hope this request reaches riot even if they turn it down, but I would drop from 40-150 dollars for this alone.

P.S. I didn't know where to put this so I put it on the support forum.

replies.body:
For future reference, this type of post would be better suited to Concepts & Creations buuuuuut I was pretty interested in the topic myself xD.

I kind of want to think Rakan might almost fall into this category, but I do realize he's not quite the perfect fit for what you're suggesting. Check him out if you haven't and let me know what you think! Are there any specifics you'd like to see in the champion if he were made?

I didn't even notice that board, I'm so blind xD. 
Anyway, Rakan seems pretty cool, but sadly not what I'm looking for. I'm thinking of something fully anthropomorphic, a devious personality, fast melee with high damage, but extremely fragile.

Thanks for reading my suggestion ^_^

We do have Azir, Nasus, and Renekton. Do they not do it for you?

I would also argue Warwick and Kindred, but they are a bit less anthropomorphic.

Nasus is my favorite champion, but they all lack style. They just look like they're angry and from ancient egypt, which I guess is the point of those characters, but that's just why they aren't a match for what I'm looking for. 
Warwick just comes off as a werewolf to me and Kindred is only half male.

I just wanted to make a suggestion for something that would make me play the game significantly more. Although it is probably only me wanting it so I guess what is currently there will have to do.
